prodNameC: 諾法鐵人類抗肺炎黴漿菌免疫球蛋白A酵素免疫分析套組(未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc: Mycoplasma Pneumoniae Coated Wells (IgA): 12 breakapart 8-well snap-off strips coated with MumpsVirus antigen. IgA Sample Diluent: 1 bottle containing 100 ml of buffer for sample dilution.Stop Solution: 1 bottle containing 15 ml sulphuric acid, 0.2 mol/l.Washing Solution (20x conc.): 1 bottle containing 50 ml of a 20-fold concentrated buffer. Mycoplasma Pneumoniae anti-IgA Conjugate: 1 bottle containing 20 ml of peroxidase labelled rabbit antibody to human IgA.TMB Substrate Solution: 1 bottle containing 15 ml TMB.Mycoplasma Pneumoniae IgA Positive Control: 2ml/bottleMycoplasma Pneumoniae IgA Cut-off Control: 2ml/bottleMycoplasma Pneumoniae IgA Negative Control: 2ml/bottle
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 定性偵測人體血清中對抗肺炎黴漿菌免疫球蛋白A類抗體。
